images.summary: This plan view shows a floating slab foundation with dimensions of 32'-0" by 28'-0". The slab includes typical 30" x 30" x 18" thick pad footings, as indicated. Rebar reinforcement consists of (2) 15M rebar, each 2'-0" long. The plan includes section callouts '2/S1' for further detail on the thickened edge construction. Dimensions such as 10'-6¾", 2'-6", and 16'-5¼" specify the layout of the slab and footings. The drawing is scaled at 1/8"=1'-0".

images.summary: This section view details the construction of a thickened edge for a floating slab foundation. The section, labeled '2/S1', shows a sill plate with ½"Ø anchor bolts spaced at 48" on center, with openings left at door locations. The slab is reinforced with (4) 15M rebar, and options for reinforcement include 6x6x½ WWM or a 16" x 16" 10M grid or fiber mesh. A 6mil poly vapor barrier is optional, and the foundation includes compacted granular 'A' and a minimum of 2" (R10) extruded polystyrene insulation. The slope grade is away from the structure at 2%. The section is scaled at 1/2"=1'-0".
